name: UNNotificationContentExtension
desc: An object that presents a custom interface for a delivered local or remote notification.

items.name: func didReceive(UNNotification)
items.desc: Delivers a new notification to your notification content app extension.

items.name: func didReceive(UNNotificationResponse, completionHandler: (UNNotificationContentExtensionResponseOption) -> Void)
items.desc: Handles a notification action selected by the user.

items.name: enum UNNotificationContentExtensionResponseOption
items.desc: Constants indicating the preferred response to a notification.

items.name: var mediaPlayPauseButtonType: UNNotificationContentExtensionMediaPlayPauseButtonType
items.desc: The type of media button type to display.

items.name: enum UNNotificationContentExtensionMediaPlayPauseButtonType
items.desc: Constants indicating the type of media button to display.

items.name: var mediaPlayPauseButtonFrame: CGRect
items.desc: The frame rectangle to use for displaying a media playback button.

items.name: var mediaPlayPauseButtonTintColor: UIColor
items.desc: The tint color for the media playback button.

items.name: func mediaPlay()
items.desc: Tells you to begin playback of your media content.

items.name: func mediaPause()
items.desc: Tells you to pause playback of your media content.
